words.source: H1961 (הָיָה, qal wayyiqtol 3ms) with conjunctive waw; KJV 'it came to pass', ESV 'during', NASB 'now it came about'

H7227 (רַב, adjective masculine plural absolute) with article; KJV 'in process of time', ESV 'many', NASB 'many'
H1992 (הֵם, personal pronoun 3mp) with article as demonstrative; KJV/ESV/NASB 'those'

words.phrase: that the king of Egypt died.
words.source: H4191 (מוּת, qal wayyiqtol 3ms) with conjunctive waw; KJV/ESV/NASB 'died'
H4428 (מֶלֶךְ, noun common masculine singular construct); KJV/ESV/NASB 'the king of'

words.phrase: And the children of Israel groaned
words.source: H584 (אָנַח, niphal wayyiqtol 3mp) with conjunctive waw; KJV 'sighed', ESV 'groaned', NASB 'sighed'
H1121 (בֵּן, noun common masculine plural construct); KJV 'the children of', ESV 'the people of', NASB 'the sons of'
H4480 (מִן, preposition); KJV 'by reason of', ESV 'because of', NASB 'because of'
H5656 (עֲבֹדָה, noun common feminine singular absolute) with article; KJV 'the bondage', ESV 'their slavery', NASB 'the bondage'
H2199 (זָעַק, qal wayyiqtol 3mp) with conjunctive waw; KJV 'cried', ESV 'cried out for help', NASB 'cried out'

words.phrase: and their cry for help went up

H4480 (מִן, preposition); KJV 'by reason of', ESV 'because of', NASB 'because of'
